default.description: Explore Computer Graphics Laboratory programs and solutions with detailed explanations and code examples.

questions.question: Write C++ program to draw a concave polygon and fill it with desired color using scan fill algorithm.
questions.title: Scan Fill Algorithm

questions.question: Write a C++ program to implement the Cohen-Sutherland line clipping algorithm.
questions.title: Cohen-Sutherland Line Clipping

questions.question: Write a C++ program to draw the following pattern. Use DDA line and Bresenhams circle drawing algorithm. Apply the concept of encapsulation.
questions.title: DDA Line and Bresenhams Circle

questions.question: Write a C++ program to draw a 2-D object and perform the following basic transformations: Scaling, Translation, Rotation. Apply the concept of operator overloading.
questions.title: 2D Transformations

questions.question: Write a C++ program to generate a Hilbert curve using the concept of fractals.
questions.title: Hilbert Curve

questions.question: Write C++ program to draw 3-D cube and perform following transformations on it using OpenGL: Scaling, Translation, Rotation about an axis (X/Y/Z).
questions.title: 3D Transformations
